product_name: BELUGA Cyclone Spray Skirt - Special Buy
long_description: The general-purpose BELUGA Spray Skirt is designed for moderate paddling conditions. It helps keep water out of your kayak's cockpit while protecting your legs from harsh sunlight. Strong bungee rim gripping system firmly secures skirt to cockpit coaming. Foam-reinforced deck keeps water rolling off and won't collapse during tricky maneuvers. Conical 4-piece waist tube with large neoprene waistband adjustment offers a great fit. Off-center grab loop assists with entry and wet exits. Mesh deck pockets store small essentials for quick access. Taped seams. Special buy.
short_description: The general-purpose BELUGA Spray Skirt is designed for moderate paddling conditions. It helps keep water out of your kayak's cockpit while protecting your legs from harsh sunlight.
